original_text: Until thy brother's anger turn away from thee, and he forget that which thou hast done to him: then I will send, and fetch thee from thence: why should I be deprived also of you both in one day?
korean_text: 네 형의 분노가 풀려 네가 자기에게 행한 것을 잊어버리거든 내가 곧 사람을 보내어 너를 거기서 불러오리라 어찌 하루에 너희 둘을 잃으랴

sentences.original_text: Until thy brother's anger turn away from thee
sentences.korean_translation: 네 형제의 분노가 너에게서 떠날 때까지

sentences.original_text: and he forget that which thou hast done to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 네가 그에게 행한 것을 잊을 때까지

sentences.original_text: why should I be deprived also of you both in one day?
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 어찌 하루 아침에 너희 둘 다 잃게 되겠느냐?
